Datatool GUI package
====================

The GUI is the user's way of interfacing with the pandas dataframes.
They have the ability to apply saved operations, or their own python code.
Use df to reference the first open sheet, df2 for the second, etc..

For more in-depth help on using the GUI, refer to the in-app help menu.

For this section of the project, we follow the MVC approach.

----------
Submodules
----------

   `datatool.gui.Controller`_

   `datatool.gui.Ui_View`_
